description:
A genuine rodeo cowboy, complete with a few scars from steer horns, and of course a cowboy hat!
Garth had been out working the "ponies" for the last 10 days, and had let his beard grow in, so we asked if he could trim it down while he filmed his peep video.
After finishing his trim job, he heads to the tub, pisses for us, then strokes his cock till he nuts!
title: Garth - peep
